overview: Kasha La Bouche, a drag performer, is ready to become a star. She finally gets her moment to shine when the famous drag mother, Señorita, enters the bar. Desperately wanting to be a part of a drag family, Kasha tries to slay her final performance. But what Kasha forgot is that she doesn’t need to look too far to find a community of her own amongst her fellow performers.
tagline: Drag is more than what's on stage
title: Foundation
